Reviews.Title: “very good loaction and clean”
Reviews.Author: Michanova
Reviews.Content: very good loaction and clean , walking distance from taksim street , good service but always the problem of language with the stuff he cannot even show me the nearst pharmacy

Reviews.Title: “Stay Away”
Reviews.Author: ruaalien2
Reviews.Content: A bunch of the bathrooms (including my own) have mold in it (I actually changed rooms because the first one was so bad), they don't really clean the bathrooms while your here, and some of the rooms and sometimes the lobby have a funky smell. The staff is so so about being friendly and helpful, I've ran into both so far. The good is it's right by Taksim Square and easy to get around from here. 7 more nights to go here is 7 to many.

Reviews.Title: “Average”
Reviews.Author: TallulahR
Reviews.Content: This hotel is centrally located. Rooms are reasonable. They can be noisy until about midnight, as there are bars in the street below. Staff are not that friendly, with one receptionist surly and unco-operative. Again, for business purposes, it is passable and convenient.

Reviews.Title: “not so bad, not so good”
Reviews.Author: Nanno_Tamer
Reviews.Content: i went there for a week stay as a honeymooner with my husband the hotel is not luxurious at all, it is enough room space just for the purpose of transit stay as a tourist inquiry of calm stay and good sleep the place is not bad at all, it is just one minute walk to find yourself in Taksim square and just 3 minutes to be located at the begining of Istiklal street, there are many resturants around too and coffeeshops... first we asked about the honeymooner suite ( that was declared as a privilage ) we were told that we will have a special room but i guess it is one of the ordinary rooms as it has nothing special i guess !!! the veiw is not bad where u stay upper floors ( we stayed in 10th )... it was calm enough to have good sleep ( although the room service supervisor that entered the room twice during our stay once while sleeping and the other i was in toilette ) the room was moderately clean ( not brilliant but at least u see nothing clear ! ) but generally u feel not great care of the place... it is just ordinary regular cleaning. breakfast was diverse enough so it is not bad but you can't classify as tasty as well, it was just very ordinary selections of cheese and extra ( i only strongly recommend their orange juice, magnifiscent ) tea and coffee supply in the room sometimes wasn't there that we were asking for it... the horrible thing that annoyed me much indeed that i came may be my fifth day to find that the two guest chairs ( that i used to put my stuff on ) were not there and the stuff put on it were put on bed, i felt so privacy invaded... i called the reception that told me to call the room service that in turn told me to call the room furnishing, that finally said that it was a problem that made them need those chairs and they will get them back just after half an hour but it never came till we left though i asked them the second day then i decided to enjoy my stay whatever and keep no place or time for anything to disturb receptionist were not so helpful as well and not all of them speak understood English my advice is that with same budget u can get better place

Reviews.Title: “Average in every way”
Reviews.Author: Croatia_ZG
Reviews.Content: Grand Oztanik is located in area close to Taksim, some 5-7 minutes walk from it. It is a good location, as it is not so noisy, so you can have a quiet night (unlike in some hotels closer to Taksim). OUtside of hotel there is a market that is opened throughout the day, which is really nice. There are also some restaurants you can go to. If you're not too demanding then hotel can get a passing grade. But that's it. I generaly stay at 4* hotels, and i would grade Grand Oztanik as 3,5 star. It is little bit dated, rooms surely need refurbishment. Reception staff seemed little confused but helpful, bar ok. There is wifi in lobby area, which i found ok, since i had to wait for some time till reception handled some details... To cut the story short - good & quiet location, average rooms, average food, nothing special but not bad if you're not a fancy type. Concerning the price, it is ok. If you're in town for few days and need a clean bed in which you can get a good night rest, give it a go.

Reviews.Title: “Dont waste your money!”
Reviews.Author: AAYTK
Reviews.Content: Ä° have booked my delux room from expedia! When we check in ,the receptionist was very rude and snob! We asked abouth the breakfast and she did not attemp to open her mought but pointed out the belboy and said he will give you the information! And we said his job is to carry the bags but your is to give information! Who do you think you are we replied open up you mought and give us the information! And she did that for gods sake!when we were up in our room it was a standard room! We called her back and wanted our delux room! We are transfered to our new room but the door was not opened and we had to wait 25 minutes mean time i had to go to my clients hotel and pick them up for a dinner in istanbul restnt! I was late! Nothing like an excuse or a complametary from hotel management! Hotel room was dirty very old and gray towels!very noisy stuf working at my flor! Stay away from this hotel as far as you can!!

Reviews.Title: “i was there in december 2011”
Reviews.Author: yuksel t
Reviews.Content: it was a nice a clean hotel,i can recomanted,you sould try

Reviews.Title: “a good choice when it is off season”
Reviews.Author: iboegypt
Reviews.Content: I just visited Istanbul for business, stayed at grand oztanik for two nights, i regularly go to Istanbul, and do find the area where grand oztanik is located as ideal if you want to stay around Taksim square and Istiklal street (the relatively new city centre, with the nice night life). the thing is that the hotel is situated on Taksim square, but in an area where cars are not allowed to enter (except to pick up or drop residents and travellers), therefore in the midst of the crowded and positively chaotic liveliness of Taksim square, you get to stay in a serene area. The hotel itself is good, with very good rooms, but as long as you are not in the high season, because than it is package tours that comprise the majority of the residents of the hotel, ie, the hotel staff don't usually care to give the required care for the residents (out of previous experiences when travelling in a high season in Istanbul)

Reviews.Title: “Dusty”
Reviews.Author: drkaren_11
Reviews.Content: I don't mind that this hotel is old but they should dust the furniture and wash the curtains. I liked the big windows. The location is excellent.

Reviews.Title: “below expectation!”
Reviews.Author: Rania76
Reviews.Content: just arriving from istanbul today..it's a very nice city and the hotel location was great but the hotel itself needs to be renovated for sure..it was raining in our room..isn't it funny and that due to the AC ..second the walls are too thin u can easily hear the conversation of your neighbor in the next room , cry of the baby and the noise of the tv! i will go back to turkey and visit istanbul but what i am sure about is that i am not going to visit this hotel again..

Reviews.Title: “we had to run away”
Reviews.Author: AlenKa1010
Reviews.Content: well.. originally this was the hotel where our friend booked us in for our istanbul trip. we were supposed to stay there 5 nights, however... managed through only 1 night as we checked in quite late and then moved to another hotel as staying in oztanik any longer was not an option. while lobby and check-in were ok, the room was just dreadful. tiny room which was supposed to be double - my hubby and i couldn't cross the room without bumping into each other! outdated tv with only 3-4- channels working, outdated furniture with wardrobe doors hanging on their own. mouldy bathtub and not working hair-dryer... MOST uncomfortable bed in the city i'd say but on top of that... i discovered BED BUGS in the mornings as my husband complained that he was bitten by something at night. very simply, we collected our staff and ran away. never again!

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely dreadful”
Reviews.Author: Helent5
Reviews.Content: Location, near taksim, square only positive thing about this hotel. Staff unfriendly and arrogant.Walked into our room saw very dated furniture very old TV. Wallpaper peeling off the wall very dirty curtains.Carpet near bathroom wall soaking wet from water leaking from the bathroom. Large disgusting stain on carpet. Fresh bloodstain on mattress protector ,covered with sheet but clearly visable. Went downstairs to complain only to be met by indifferent staff. No apology.Their solution was to send a boy with a large carpet cleaning machine to try and soak up some of the water.Finally offered another room not much better and stank of cigarettes. Left and found beautiful clean hotel around the corner.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, good rooms”
Reviews.Author: Tanmay_Joshi
Reviews.Content: There are 2 good places to stay in Istanbul. Sultanahmet for all the historical sights around it, and Taksim if you want to experience the modern side of Istanbul. This hotel is a stone's throw away from Taksim Square and Istiklal Caddesi, the main night-life hub of Istanbul. The rooms are big and comfortable, the neighbourhood is quiet and lined with street-cafes and restaurants; so there are plenty of options around.No complaiints, but this hotel is not exactly built to be romantic; so for couples, it probably wouldnt be a good idea.

Reviews.Title: “Barely 2 star”
Reviews.Author: Riviera56
Reviews.Content: Unhelpful staff, extremely poor breakfast! the worst mattress ever! The only good thing about the hotel, it's located in a fairly quiet location near Taksim square. Not very close to the blue mosque and Hagia Sophia, around 15 min away by car, however do not use Taxis, take the metro and train.

Reviews.Title: “Awful”
Reviews.Author: ybhabha
Reviews.Content: Our stay at Grand Oztanik was highly disappointing! Please update your photoâ€™s on the internet, as they are highly deceiving. The hotel does not fall under the 4star category, instead itâ€™s more 2 star to 3 star. The frontline staff need a more customer friendly approach to tourist! The rooms are dark and dingy with dirty curtains. We were panicked about our transfer back to the airport and kept asking the manager in the hotel to enquire for us, but he was simply arrogant and asked for us to be in the reception area at 11h00. Eventually the porter asked us to accompany him down the road for our transport. We waited and waited with no knowledge as to what was happening. The porter then said we should go further down the road, this walk ended up being close to 2 â€“ 3 kmâ€™s until we reached our transfer. We had 2 elderly people with us and it was such an effort for them to walk that far. The hotel could have arranged a taxi for us to be taken down to the main road, but of course they had no concern for what so ever. I will certainly not recommend your hotel to family or friends!

Reviews.Title: “Great location, but another indistinguishable modern hotel”
Reviews.Author: AnontravellerMumbai
Reviews.Content: The location is absolutely perfect. About five minutes walk from istiklal street which is where the night life is with lots of shopping and bars and night life. It is a modern hotel with many rooms and nothing different from the present days hotels of the same calibre world wide. The location makes it a must stay!

Reviews.Title: “not bad as reviews said”
Reviews.Author: bobbogaz
Reviews.Content: good hotel in a great location, just 1 minute walk from taksim square the heart of istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic food”
Reviews.Author: ninceg
Reviews.Content: Fantastic hotel near Taxim square in a quiet part. Interior is very nice, rooms very nice but not so big and bed so comfortable. Also very clean. Food is fantastic!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “hate it”
Reviews.Author: Alinorbeirut
Reviews.Content: didnt like it at all, the rooms are barely 3 stars and dirty the service is bad, the showers make noise and leeks water no tissue papers or roll paper. we had to call the room service 7 times each time we needed anything. the extra charges that includs local call was excagorated. hate beenig there. alot of noise all around even if the windows are closed

Reviews.Title: “Furniture needs to be replaced,”
Reviews.Author: Abu-Khalid73
Reviews.Content: The location is perfect, AC is OK, break fast is average...Issues in the quality of the beds.. prepare your self with a very bad back pains when you wake up in the mornings.. Plumbing issues.. when pumps are on, sounds can be heard in the rooms..

Reviews.Title: “Do not come here!”
Reviews.Author: thalita007
Reviews.Content: Rooms are dark, view from my room is on a dirty side street. Towels smell bad, and the worst is the mattress...oh my god, my back is hurting, I feel the metal pressing. Rooms are loud and I can hear everything what my neighbours do. No way this is 4-star, it is 1-2 star! We are checking out today to move to a better place.

Reviews.Title: “Looks classy from reception but room hardly 4 star.”
Reviews.Author: Femaleperspective
Reviews.Content: This is a large "marbled" hotel just off Taksim Square, the main business and social area of Istanbul. Reception was excellent and the staff attentive. Room service was prompt. Common areas were of a 4 star standard; the lobby and the leisure centre. The bedroom was small with a rather dark oppressive look and had no tea making facilities. Wifi was free. Breakfast was a buffet style with a wide variety of food.The hotel was very good in accommodating everyone when flights were cancelled and the volcano chaos ensued. Other hotels were used or some people doubled up. There was no question of ejecting anyone. Friendly hotel but expensive for what it is. Not in the most interesting area of Istanbul though if you were sight seeing. Istanbul is a stunning place and the best part is around the Blue Mosque area. Give up drinking wine! Â£8 a glass and just plonk.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: Cherry26
Reviews.Content: I have to confess that I was a bit worried reading these comments, but I was surprised when got there. Standard double room was large enough, and it looks more like triple. Hotels people were more than kind and helpful. Moreover, they provided me with great help when I wanted to surprise my boyfriend for his birthday celebration. Location is very good. As I am going to Istanbul in few days, I will stay there again. I would recommend this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “VERY GOOD HOTEL IN A NICE AREA”
Reviews.Author: aektzis
Reviews.Content: The hotel was very good , comfortable , near the attractions,delicious breakfast with a variety of food. The bad experience of the trip in Istanbul was a taverna in Prigiponisa called "CAPRI - Stamboulidis George" who charges over 100% the normal prices if you eat there, without offering a better quality of food- they rip off the tourists with the excuse that they give commission of the bill to the travel guides.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly & Close to Attractions”
Reviews.Author: jasda
Reviews.Content: On arrival, we were greeted by friendly and helpful staff, provided a complimentary drink. The hotel has a very good location - only a few minutes of walking from Taksim square and Istiklal street, Shuttle bus from the airport stops around the corner so you don't need to take a taxi. Metro station - Taksim square - in 2 minutes walk. The room and bathroom were clean.. The breakfast buffet was plentiful with a good selection on offer. Overall, the hotel is really good and I would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Total Dissapointment”
Reviews.Author: Sinbad13
Reviews.Content: Much improvement is needed namely in cleanliness and service. I dont know how it was classified as a 4 star hotel. I would honestly rate it 3 stars AT BEST. If you are looking to spend quality time in Istanbul you can find a much better place to stay in.

Reviews.Title: “Did not like it”
Reviews.Author: Traveller13Toronto
Reviews.Content: 1) Location: Great 2) Service: Not good 3) Cleanliness: Needs improvement 4) Value: Not good 5) Staff: Below average 6) Food: Havent tried it yet...I dont know if I should 7) Overall: Do not expect a lot...You could find somtehing better

Reviews.Title: “Excellent..”
Reviews.Author: matakan
Reviews.Content: Location of hotel is at the hotel district of the taksim area(talimhane). by walking you can reach to famous taksim square and beyoÄŸlu street in 5 min. Next of the hotel there is a metro station( by using metro lines you can reach business centers, shoping centers and stadiums). Rooms are very clean and comfortable, my room was have a view of bosphorus. Hotel has swimming pool and gym, its for free for coustumers. If you pay 30$ you can use Turkish Bath and sauna(but reservation recommended) by paying 80$ you can take really perfect massage. Hotel breakfast is very reach and tasty. Coustomers were generally from EU caountires and the hotel was quite. From the reception you can book for Ä°stanbul Tours to the historical places, famous places and other places.. Staff is very helpfull. Rooms are very comfartable and clean. Around the hotel you can find mini markets, pharmacy, gift shops, and nice restaurants.

Reviews.Title: “bad..bad”
Reviews.Author: sueGreece
Reviews.Content: It is supposed that the Hoteli 4stars+. I think it is 2 stars. Dirty carpet, bad quality of towels,no bathrobes,no slippers,noisy aircondition ,poor mini bar, bad quality of amenities, bad mattress. No I shall not come back to this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Bad Experince at the Gramd Oztanik Hotel”
Reviews.Author: busyllizzie
Reviews.Content: We spent 3 nights at this hotel in early November. I had read earlier reviews posted on Trip Advisor and was a bit concerned. Our booking agent dismissed my concerns and we thought okay we will go with an open mind. I am afraid our experience was not good. Our room was dirty, particularly the bathroom. The location of our room was looking out onto a street which was very noisy during the early morning hours. We arrived back at 5.30pm from a long day touring Istanbul to a room which had not been cleaned. The reception staff were very unfriendlly. Sorry but I cannot recoomend this hotel. On a positive note the breakfast buffet was good, however the restaurant staff also unfriendly. We were traveling as part of a group of 16 and I do know others had similar complaints. I am in the hospitlaity and tourism business myself so know first hand that little things make a difference. Sorry to be negative but I loved Turkey regardless!!

Reviews.Title: “Unrealised Potential”
Reviews.Author: jayaye
Reviews.Content: Location is great, handy to Taksim Square, bus terminal and the funicular down to the trams that take you to the Golden Horn area, ferry terminal, Topkapi, Hagia Sophia & Blue mosque etc. Good reception area with agreeable porters. Reception staff omitted any briefing of the facilities in the hotel; dining room, bars, pool etc. Rooms were spacious& comfortable however bathrooms have an unsightly mildew problem. Windows are double glazed but didn't block out the amplified crooner at a restaurant below who insisted on singing 'til 2.00AM! Breakfast was one of the best we experienced in 14 days in Turkey. Air conditioning cooling was almost non existent; plenty of fan but it only pushed the air around. Overall a hotel supposedly opened 5 years ago but looking its age already when a bit more attention to detail could really lift it out of the ordinary.

HotelInfo.Name: Grand Oztanik Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Topcu Cad. No: 9-11 | Taksim, Istanbul, Turkey
